jot.io.sound

Interface Sound

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Sound3D

    public interface Sound
    Interface that the sound handler must implement.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Stop playing sounds and delete any buffers and sources.
      float getGain(String soundId)
      Method to get the gain/volume of a given sound.

      Method to get the pitch of a given sound.

      Method to play a sound.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        boolean load(String filePath,
             String fileName,
             boolean toLoop)
        Method to load a sound nm.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to load.
        fileName - the name of the file content to load.
        toLoop - parameter to set sound to play once or in loop.
        Returns:
        TRUE if sound already loaded, FALSE otherwise.

      • pause

        void pause(String soundId)
        Method to pause playing sound.
        Parameters:
        soundId - the identifier of the sound to pause.

      • play

        void play(String soundId)
        Method to play a sound.
        Parameters:
        soundId - the identifier of the sound to play.

      • stop

        void stop(String soundId)
        Method to stop playing sound.
        Parameters:
        soundId - the identifier of the sound to stop.

      • getGain

        float getGain(String soundId)
        Method to get the gain/volume of a given sound. The gain/volume is between [0;1].
        Parameters:
        soundId - the identifier of the sound.
        Returns:
        the gain/volume in the interval [0;1] of the sound.

      • setGain

        void setGain(String soundId,
             float gain)
        Method to set the gain/volume of a given sound. The gain/volume is between [0;1], numbers outside this interval are set to the closest interval extrema.
        Parameters:
        soundId - the identifier of the sound.
        gain - the gain/volume to set the sound.

      • getPitch

        float getPitch(String soundId)
        Method to get the pitch of a given sound. The pitch is between [0;1].
        Parameters:
        soundId - the identifier of the sound.
        Returns:
        the pitch in the interval [0;1] of the sound.

      • setPitch

        void setPitch(String soundId,
              float pitch)
        Method to set the pitch of a given sound. The pitch is between [0;1], numbers outside this interval are set to the closest interval extrema.
        Parameters:
        soundId - the identifier of the sound.
        pitch - the pitch to set the sound.

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Stop playing sounds and delete any buffers and sources.
